abstrac: Email Marketer & Automation Specialist and CRM Manager
bio:
Email marketing professional and CRM manager with half a decade of experience in campaign setup and management, CRM management, newsletter creation, automation setup, and landing page design. I'm proficient with WordPress, ActiveCampaign, Unbounce, QuickMail, MailFlow, GetResponse, MailChimp, Zapier, Bitrix24 CRM, and Copywriting, among others. 

I have a year of professional experience working in an organized environment as an email marketing specialist and CRM manager. I have handled various aspects of campaign automation, integration, and landing page design. 

Over the last year, I have handled the full automation of not less than 3 WordPress WooCommerce websites with Bitrix24 CRM, created no fewer than 100 email campaigns in QuickMail, ActiveCampaign, MailChimp, Systeme, ClickFunnel, and Bitrix24, and designed at least 20 landing pages.

As a customer-oriented individual, I strive to offer the best services to improve my clients' businesses and help them achieve their goal. My specialties include:

- Landing page design using WordPress, Wix, Kajabi, Unbounce, Systeme, Bitrix24, etc.
- Campaign setup and automation
- CRM Management
- Lead management
- Copywriting
- Email hosting
- Email template design
- Campaign tracking, etc.

While there are lots of other professionals that offer services in my skillset, here's why I'm the best:

- Expert in the chosen skillset
- Professional experience working in an organized environment
- English proficiency
- Result oriented
- Creative thinker
- Leadership skills and team player
- Strong communicator
- Superior Attention to Detail
- Excellent at multitasking
- Customer-oriented
- On-time job delivery
- Unlimited review until you're 100% satisfied

I look forward to using my skills to improve your business and take it to the next level which you've imagined.

Available for short term, contract, recurring, and temporary-permanent jobs either as a freelancer or a remote staff/team member. I'm available to work for 30 hours a week and payment is at the end of each week. I'm skilled in using slack, zoom, Microsoft teams, discord, and skype.

abstrac: Professional, reliable English Spanish Translation Services and Virtual Assistant
bio:
I am a professional English > Spanish Sworn Translator with over 20 years of experience, mainly in the technical (IT) field, but also with strong experience in Medicine / Biochemistry / Health Sciences, Engineering, Legal & Finance. 

My work as translator has provided me with strong abilities to research, write, draft, review and edit all kinds of written material and also has provided me with a keen eye for detail, detection of typos, improvement of both the source and target texts through the spotting of inconsistencies, adherence to style guides, coherence, etc. Freelance working has also taught me to deal with clients from different countries, cultures and time zones with all the things that working on one’s own entail: prospecting, quoting, invoicing, managing budgets, deadlines and priorities.

And, simultaneously to my freelance work as translator, I have also worked in-company for different organizations throughout the years, mainly in positions as Secretary to General Managers, where I have acquired a wide array of valuable administrative and executive experience in many tasks. To mention some of them: Handling of work and personal schedules. Phone call screening. Meeting coordination. Interpreting. Office supplies management. Writing of letters, faxes, reports. Creation, drawing up, tracking and follow up of all kinds of sent and received documents. Filing and Archiving. Organization of different events, travels, reservations. Budget requests, expense reports. Preparation of offer folders, and bid specs for tenders. Document checking and verification. Contact with and payment to suppliers, among others.

I am confident of being able to make a valuable contribution with my advanced knowledge of both English and Spanish, plus all my different skills in the above-mentioned office tasks, together with my willingness to learn new things and develop towards new goals and challenges. I am proficient in the use of MS Office, Google Suite and videoconference apps.

Native language: Spanish (Lat Am) Working pair: EN <>ES Daily output: 3000 - 4000 words average 
Rates: USD 0.09 word 
Hourly rate: USD 30.00

Standard Availability: Monday to Friday 8 - 18 
Rush jobs / weekends: open to discussion

Payments via: SafePay / Paypal / credit card

abstrac: Let my drawings tell your story
bio:
I´m an illustrator. I´ve been one ever since I can remember. I started drawing as a child and never stoped. I tried to "get serious" and graduated as a graphic designer at Palermo University. I like graphic design and I´m good at it, but it doesn´t fulfill my artistic needs, so I went back to college and graduated as a comic book designer, and I´ve been coloring , drawing and writing comic books ever since.
Most of my work was commisioned by independant publishers, the most recent one "Zana" published by Emet Comics ( for sale here: https://www.comixology.com/Zana/comics-series/60601?ref=cHVibGlzaGVyL3ZpZXcvZGVza3RvcC9saXN0L3Nlcmllc0xpc3Q ) I colored issues 2,3 nd 4, and did all the art and colors for double feature issue 5 ( 54 pages). You can see samples in my portfolio. :)

I also love to design book covers, characters (3D and 2D) and illustrate children books.

For comic book pages/book illustration : we´ll set a fee per page, and I´ll send an invoice every 5 pages. 2 revisions included in the initial fee. Following revisions are charged individually. 

For cover images: We´ll set a price for the whole design, including illustration, texts (title, author´s name, blurb for the back-cover, isbn code etc), and layout. 
3 revisions included in the initial fee. Following revisions are charged individually. I´ll provide several file formats (vector, images, PDF, etc).

I´ll send an invoice upon completion.

I work regular hours: monday to friday and the ocassional saturday if there is a deadline pressing. (I hate missing deadlines and will do everything in my power to avoid it).

abstrac: La honradez, lealtad y responsabilidad son primordiales para realizar cualquier trabajo/actividad
bio:
Soy Camila Rebolledo González, vivo en Chile. Actualmente estoy con licencia médica con un diagnóstico de Fibromialgia Severa Refractaria 2daria a Monoplejia en pierna derecha, ocasionada por la 1era y única dosis de Vacuna Sinvocac.
Tengo 27 años, este año término de estudiar Contabilidad Auditoria de modo Online, para desarrollarme en este nuevo ámbito laboral.
Mis hobbies son el maquillaje artístico, dibujo, canto, natación, tejer a crochet, también jugar en consolas de videojuegos, como también jugar a veces ajedrez como competidora de mi pareja. 
Me criaron con valores y principios de honestidad, valorar lo que se tiene, a ser fuerte con el destino, a levantarme de las caídas, valorarme y ser fiel a mi misma, por lo que soy una persona que siente que puede soportar todo.
Me considero una persona ansiosa y curiosa por aprender nuevas cosas. Algo como anecdota es que me crié viendo a mi padre reparar muchos artefactos, por ende, se valerme por mi misma para conocimientos como gasfiteria, electricidad, automotriz y entre otras cosas. Esto me hizo aprender del orden y la disciplina para comprender mejor.
Me gusta la cocina, la moda, la lingüística y siempre trato de aprender nuevos idiomas como algo de: coreano, danés, sueco; aunque me ingles no es muy fluido comprendo auditivamente todo.
Me gusta el conocimiento y si hay algo nuevo e interesante lo buscaré hasta conseguir hacerlo a la perfección.

Trabajaba bajo presión constante, habían días que había mucha afluencia de público por lo que al ser la más joven atendía a todos los clientes con la mayor rapidez y evitar que ellos mismos hicieran tanto tiempo de espera en filas.
Solía atender a 1 persona por minuto, memorizado su lista (tengo memoria fotográfica autidiva, olfativa y espacial) por ende recordaba exactamente la reposición de cada objeto y medicamento dentro de la farmacia.
Mientras mis compañeros atendían lentamente yo los atendía rápido pero sin desatender ningún tipo de necesidad, cumpliendo el protocolo exigido como empresa y así mismo luego la misma gente buscaba luego que yo misma los atendiera.
Mi jefe (Químico Farmacéutico) me llamaba la Químico líder N°3 ya que poseía el conocimiento químico y farmocinetico de cada medicamento del local, además ayudaba constantemente en el inventario, manejo de pedidos y orden a superiores, buscando fallas.
También era conocida por reparar los puntos (computadores) antes que pudiesen ayuda a los técnicos para no perder tiempo y mejorar el servicio general.
Optimizaba el tiempo de trabajo y a veces durante los periodos que no entraba gente, estudiaba, avanzaba en mis trabajos desde el celular y así mismo ponía en práctica lo que aprendía día a día en clases.
Puedo trabajar bajo presión constante, ordenes y listas con trabajos que realizar sin olvidar ninguno, y así mismo podía responder con eficacia y eficiencia en lo laboral.
El ambiente de trabajo no era el ideal pero el esfuerzo de día a día era lo que contabilizaba, convirtiendo algo hostil en algo agradable y de buen momento para disfrutar
